Description: The Guild OM-120 Orchestra has a bold tone that suits a wide range of music styles. This acoustic's comfortable all-mahogany body has a sweet, mellow, and complex tone with just the right amount of bite to cut through a mix. The OM-120 belongs to Guild's popular Westerly series of vintage-inspired acoustics. These pay tribute to Guild's golden-era flat tops with some exciting vintage specs, such as a classic Guild C-shaped neck and 1960s period-correct appointments. Body Shape: Orchestra Finish: Polyurethane GlossTop Wood: Solid African Mahogany Back & Sides Wood: Solid African Mahogany Body Bracing: X Scalloped Neck Wood: Mahogany Neck Shape: C shape Radius: 16" Fingerboard Material: Indian Rosewood Fingerboard Inlay: Mother-of-pearl dots Number of Frets: 20 Scale Length: 25.5" Tuning Machines: Guild vintage style open gear Bridge Material: Indian Rosewood Nut/Saddle Material: Bone/Bone Nut Width: 1.75" Body Length: 19.5" Body Width: 15.25" lower bout, 11.25" upper bout Shipping Policy: We ship Fedex or USPS in the continental USA free. Alaska, Hawaii and US territories have a $40.00 charge. International shipping is by USPS Priority Mail International. International buyers pay all costs involved in shipping and import including all transport costs, duties, fees, taxes or other costs. Return Policy: 30 days, buyer pays all return shipping costs.
Title: Guild OM-120 Concert Size Acoustic Steel String Mahogany Guitar w/Case

ConditionDescription: This guitar is set up and ready to play, everything works. It came to us directly from Guild, and is in un-played condition with only surface marks from handling. The action is set at 3/32" at the 12th fret, and the truss rod is active. We are selling it as manufacturer refurbished with a 90 day factory warranty and Guild PolyFoam Case. There are no issues with this guitar.
